name: Serpent Bearer GDKO Round 2
description:
My submission to GDKO Round 2: "make a toy"

After the first round, I promised that this time I'll submit my 3D project.

Controller is recommended, but you can also play with mouse and keyboard.

My high score is 30. What is yours?

--------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

  • Move: 
    • WASD or Left Joystick
  • Look Around:
    • Left CTRL + mouse or Right Joystick
  • Teleport/Dash:
    • Space or A button (xbox controller) / X button (ps controller)
  • Arrow (aim):
    • Right mouse or LT (xbox controller) / R2 (ps controller)
  • Arrow (shoot):
    • Left mouse or B (xbox controller) / O (ps controller)
  • Exit: 
    • ESC

--------------------------------------------------

MUSIC:
https://opengameart.org/content/arclight-epic-orchestralrock-soundtrack
